page.title: 08MY BICYCLE
page.content: My bike is light blue in colour. It is a girls' bike which means that it has not got a crossbar between the saddle and the handlebars. It has got two 28" wheels, the back wheel being connected by a chain to two pedals. On the handlebars there are two brake levers, one for each wheel. It also has a bell. Some bikes have a basket or a saddlebag but mine hasn't. It has three gears and the lever to work these is also on the handlebars. Most boys I know have bikes called BMX bikes which are designed for riding over rough ground and for performing tricks but I prefer my bike for riding along the roads.
